resources.string: Which character from Harry Potter are you ?
I - Who disarmed Dumbledore on the top of the tower ?
II - In The Goblet Of Fire, which dragon must Harry fight ?
III - What\'s the name of the House-Elf which helps Harry ?
V - Which one of the Weasley twins loses his ear ?
VI - What\'s Hermione Granger\'s second name ?
VII - Who are Ron\'s brother(s) and sister(s) ?
VIII - What are Ron and Hermione\'s children\'s names ?
IX - Who gets rid of Tom Riddle\'s diary in the toilets ?
X - What is the physical charateristic of Merope (Voldemort\'s mother) ?
Her eyes don\'t look into the same direction
One of her fingers is missing
She has a scar on her right arm
MUGGLE \nWould have a spell of amnesia been cast on you or you really don\'t know anything adout the world of Harry Potter ?
SQUIB \nYou have already heard about Harry Potter, maybe you even have seen the movies but you were probably doing something else.
CREGORY GOYLE \nYou the magical world but to you, your muscles are worth better than your brain !
RUBEUS HAGRID \nYou like to wander around the castle and even in the Forbidden Forest, but you are far from knowing anything about Hogwarts lessons.
LUNA LOVEGOOD \nYou live in your own world, you often where your radish-shaped earrings and your Butterbeer cork necklace, you believe in magical conspiracy theories.
SEAMUS FINNIGAN \nYou are a half-blood, you like to pretend that you lived your childhood on a broomstick but at school you make everything explode.
TONGUE-TYING \nYou know secret things about the magical world but you stay dumb about them.
REGULUS BLACK \nYou thought being a Deatheater would be great before you discovered the true face of Voldemort.
NEVILLE LONGBOTTOM \nAt first, shy and ridiculous, Neville turned himself into a powerful wizard.
HERMIONE GRANGER \nJust like her, you love to read and you swallowed thousands of Harry Potter\'s adventures pages.
HARRY POTTER \nBesides having read the books and seen the movies, you really lived his adventures, you are a first grade wizard !
